Question: Irritated to see Christian among the band, this person struck up "Rose Room", not expecting the guitarist to know the tune.
Hints: By August 1935, this person found himself with a band that was nearly broke, disillusioned and ready to quit.
This person also played three special concerts produced by jazz aficionado and Chicago socialite Helen Oakley.
A longtime resident of Stamford, Connecticut, this person is interred in the Long Ridge Cemetery in Stamford.
